hero.title: Move from inspiration to action
hero.description: Michael Pellegrini, certified life coach, helps you unleash your creative potential and transform your life by tapping into your inspiration.
hero.ariaLabel: Hero header of the home page

feature-one.title: Stimulating awareness
feature-one.description: I help you to overcome your blockages, identify your resistance and act more effectively using emotional and creative tools.

feature-two.title: A safe place
feature-two.description: I create a confidential, caring and non-judgmental space, conducive to raising awareness and finding solutions tailored to your needs.

feature-three.title: Artistic development
feature-three.description: I'll help you overcome your creative blocks, deconstruct impostor syndrome and assert your true artistic identity.

feature-four.title: A holistic vision
feature-four.description: My approach, based on the 5 forms of intelligence and advances in neuroscience, reveals your deepest needs and guides you towards lasting solutions.

showcase-one.title: Stimulate awareness
showcase-one.description: Awareness is essential to understanding and accepting your own mechanisms. Using tools that engage the emotions and creativity, I help you to go beyond the limits imposed by the mind. This enables you to identify your resistances and saboteurs, which are holding you back. Once these obstacles have been recognised, you can then take more effective action.

showcase-two.title: A safe place
showcase-two.description: I create a safe and caring environment, where strict confidentiality and the absence of judgement or diagnosis free up the floor to speak. This space of trust fosters a deep awareness of your personal and professional challenges, enabling you to find solutions tailored to your needs.

showcase-three.title: Artistic development
showcase-three.description: I'll help you overcome your creative blocks and become a full player in your own artistic development. Together, we will deconstruct the imposter syndrome to reveal and affirm your true creative identity.

showcase-four.title: A holistic vision
showcase-four.description: Based on the 5 forms of intelligence (cognitive, emotional, somatic, intuitive and collective), my approach also incorporates a global vision, the use of body language and the latest advances in neuroscience. These techniques enable me to reveal your deepest needs and guide you towards lasting solutions.

about-section.title: Michael Pellegrini
about-section.description-p1: A passionate musician, composer and multi-instrumentalist, Michael has devoted his life to exploring musical expression in all its forms. His love of sharing and teaching has naturally led him to accompany his students in the discovery of their own artistic identity. Faced with the blocks and challenges that many creative people encounter, he chose to train in coaching to offer effective tools for overcoming them.
about-section.description-p2: Certified as a Professional Coach through the RelationCare® Coaching approach of the WAKAN school, founded by David Denis Hertz, MCC, Michael combines expertise and kindness to help you unleash your potential. This training, internationally accredited by the ICF (ACTP) and nationally recognised by EDUQUA, guarantees quality coaching.
about-section.description-p3: Michael is convinced that awareness is the key to understanding and transforming your inner workings. By integrating tools that engage the emotions and creativity, he guides you to go beyond the limits imposed by the mind. In a safe, confidential and non-judgmental environment, you can identify your resistance and saboteurs, paving the way for more effective action.
about-section.description-p4: His holistic approach is based on the five forms of intelligence: cognitive, emotional, somatic, intuitive and collective. Drawing on the latest advances in neuroscience and paying particular attention to body language, Michael helps you to reveal your deepest needs and find lasting solutions.

social-proof.title: Certified Coach
social-proof.description: Professional coach certified by the RelationCare® Coaching approach of the WAKAN school, created by David Denis Hertz, MCC. ACTP accredited by the ICF internationally and EDUQUA nationally.

pricing-one.description: A free plan to discover our services and test them.

pricing-two.description: A premium plan to enjoy all our services without limits.

pricing-three.description: A business plan for companies that want to go further.

cta-section.title: Unleash Your Creative Potential
cta-section.description: Take the first step towards artistic fulfilment - Join my coaching programme

question-one.question: How can a life coach help me ?
question-one.answer: A life coach can effectively support you on your journey towards action. By using tools to bypass mental obstacles and exploring your emotions, you'll discover lasting answers to your questions.

question-two.question: How do coaching sessions work ?
question-two.answer: Sessions begin by identifying your current needs and setting specific objectives for the current session. Through questioning and exercises involving the imagination, the body and the emotions, we progress together towards concrete actions to achieve your goals.

question-three.question: What types of problems or challenges can be addressed in life coaching ?
question-three.answer: In life coaching, all problems, challenges, desires and dreams related to the present or the future can be addressed.

question-four.question: Is life coaching confidential ?
question-four.answer: Confidentiality is paramount to ensure the success and benefits of a coaching session. All information exchanged is treated confidentially.

Booking.title: Booking
Booking.description: Book your appointment online in just a few clicks, no strings attached. It's quick, easy and convenient ! Here's how it works :
Booking.process: Choose a time that works for you; Fill out the form with your details; Get a confirmation email with the meeting details; Done ! The appointment is booked.
